valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 25 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 26 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: Atlantic low 983 moving northeast, expected 250 miles west of Bailey 966 by 0600 Friday. High southern Norway drifting eastwards expected lithuania 1037 be same time
